attributes.action: ensure that the Boundary Commission corrects the present situation whereby the Conservative Party can receive 10% more votes than Labour and only have one more MP in Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No political party should be presented with the uphill struggle faced by the Conservatives. The Boundary Commission does not appear to have been fulfilling the role required of it in our present political system. If this petition is asking for the impossible, the electoral system should be changed

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Boundary Commission.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
